## R --- базовые знания

- [Cheat-sheet по RStudio](https://www.rstudio.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/rstudio-IDE-cheatsheet.pdf) от [RStudio](https://www.rstudio.com)
- Очень краткая шпаргалка по R [Cheat-sheet по базовому R](http://www.rstudio.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/r-cheat-sheet.pdf) от [Mhairi McNeill](http://mhairihmcneill.com/)
- Более подробная шпаргалка [R reference card](https://cran.r-project.org/doc/contrib/Short-refcard.pdf) от Tom Short
- [Data import cheat-sheet](https://github.com/rstudio/cheatsheets/raw/master/source/pdfs/data-import-cheatsheet.pdf)

## Многомерная статистика (в т.ч. на R)

- Clarke, K. R., Gorley R. N. (2006) PRIMER v6: User Manual/Tutorial. PRIMER-E, Plymouth.
- __Borcard, D., Gillet, F., Legendre, P., 2011. Numerical ecology with R. Springer.__
- __Legendre P., Legendre L. (2012) Numerical ecology.__
- __Zuur, A. F., Ieno, E. N., Smith, G. M. (2007) Analysing Ecological Data. Springer__

## Статистика на R

- Кабаков Р.И. R в действии. Анализ и визуализация данных на языке R. М.: ДМК Пресс, 2014
- Diez, D.M., Barr, C.D. and Çetinkaya-Rundel, M., 2015. [OpenIntro Statistics](https://www.openintro.org/stat/textbook.php?stat_book=os) OpenIntro.
- Logan, M., 2011. Biostatistical design and analysis using R: a practical guide. Wiley
- Maindonald, J., Braun, J., 2006. Data Analysis and Graphies Using R: An Example-based Approach (Cambridge Series in Statistical and Probabilistic Mathematics). Cambridge University Press.
- Teetor, P., 2011. R cookbook. O’Reilly.
- **Zuur, A., Ieno, E.N. and Smith, G.M., 2007. Analyzing ecological data.** Springer Science & Business Media.


## Статистика

- Гланц, С., 1998. Медико-биологическая статистика. М., Практика.
- **Quinn, G.G.P., Keough, M.J., 2002. Experimental design and data analysis for biologists. Cambridge University Press.**
- Sokal, R.R., Rohlf, F.J., 1995. Biometry (3rd edn). WH Freman and company: New York.
- Zar, J.H., 2010. Biostatistical Analysis. Prentice Hall: New York.
- **Zuur, A., Ieno, E.N. and Smith, G.M., 2007. Analyzing ecological data.** Springer Science & Business Media.
